fields.name: AgentPublicKeyCertificate
fields.description: Base64 encoded public certificate used by the agent to do the initial handshake to the backend services in Azure.

fields.name: AgentVersion
fields.description: Version of the agent running on the connected cluster resource

fields.name: ConnectivityStatus
fields.description: Represents the connectivity status of the connected cluster.

fields.name: Distribution
fields.description: The Kubernetes distribution running on this connected cluster.

fields.name: Infrastructure
fields.description: The infrastructure on which the Kubernetes cluster represented by this connected cluster is running on.

fields.name: KubernetesVersion
fields.description: The Kubernetes version of the connected cluster resource

fields.name: LastConnectivityTime
fields.description: Time representing the last instance when heart beat was received from the cluster

fields.name: ManagedIdentityCertificateExpirationTime
fields.description: Expiration time of the managed identity certificate

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: Provisioning state of the connected cluster resource.

fields.name: TotalCoreCount
fields.description: Number of CPU cores present in the connected cluster resource

fields.name: TotalNodeCount
fields.description: Number of nodes present in the connected cluster resource
